text: Mmmm... Don't you just love it when you come back from the bathroom to find your food waiting for you?
speaker: Mia Wallace

text: We're lucky we got anything at all. I don't think Buddy Holly's much of a waiter.
speaker: Vincent Vega

text: Maybe we should've sat in Marilyn Monroe's section.
speaker: Vincent Vega

text: No, there's not. That is Marilyn Monroe. That is Mamie Van Doren.
speaker: Vincent Vega

text: I don't see Jayne Mansfield, so she must have the night off.
speaker: Vincent Vega

text: So did you think of somethin' to say?
speaker: Mia Wallace

text: However... you seem like a really nice person, and I... I don't want to offend you.
speaker: Vincent Vega

text: Oooh. This doesn't sound like the usual, mindless, boring, gettin'-to-know-you chitchat.
speaker: Mia Wallace

text: This sounds like you actually have somethin' to say.
speaker: Mia Wallace

text: Well, well, I do. I do.
speaker: Vincent Vega
